name: Dress Up Games Stylist - Fashion Diva Style 👗
name_original: Dress Up Games Stylist - Fashion Diva Style 👗
description:
The makers of ‘International Fashion Stylist’ and ‘Star Fashion Designer’ bring you a glamorous new fashion & dress up game. Take on the runway, one stunning look at a time! Enter the dazzling world of High Fashion. Discover couture fashion!

Go crazy with exclusive clothing and pretty jewelry. Make everyone’s eyes sparkle as they watch beautiful girls grace the ramp! Dress the hottest models in exclusive looks. Create your own signature shows with gorgeous outfits, hairstyles, accessories and make up. Style interesting looks at the studio for exciting theme-based challenges, and impress everyone with your creative flair.

🌟🌟🌟 Become a FASHION GURU!!! Download Dress Up Games Stylist - Fashion Diva Style 👗 for FREE from the Google Play Store NOW!!! 🌟🌟🌟

Main Features:

🏆 Play in multiplayer mode - Compete 1 on 1 on Fashion Events!
👩 Style your model - Models are waiting for you to style them!
👗 Design your perfect look - Outrageously stylish clothes and accessories!
💄 Create your ideal style - Trendy hairstyles & ultra glam makeup!
👩‍⚖️ Dress to impress - Make everyone astound when they see your unexpected dressup style choices you covet
🎊 Exciting themes and breathtaking challenges - Feel the real pressure and tension of a runway show!

🏆 Multiplayer Mode

Do you think your style is the best?
Play 1 on 1 with other divas in exciting fashion events, and find out for yourself!
Get inspired by choices of others, improve your style, and may the best Fashion Diva win!!!

👗 Design your perfect look
Be the glowing star of your own fashon show studio! Give your model an attractive make up and Dress Up them up with many beautiful dresses. If you are one of the young girls who covet the fashon world and dream to become a model, we offer you the opportunity to live your fantasy!

💄 Create your ideal style

Become a superstar beauty studio stylist and make your model look fabulous with new fashon outfit. You have the opportunity to be the dressup and make up designer. Try a unique fantasy style and makeup, jewelry collection, glasses and hairstyles. The models need the perfect make up for the occasion! Your girls will glow and you can share your designer makeup abilities with your friends!

🌟🌟🌟 Become a FASHION GURU!!! Download Dress Up Games Stylist - Fashion Diva Style 👗 for FREE from the Google Play Store NOW!!! 🌟🌟🌟


Dress Up Games Stylist - Fashion Diva Style 👗 requires the following permissions :
* ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION : This permissions is required by ad networks.
* READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE / WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : This permission is required for saving your creations

Please note that we use Advertising ID for serving better ads and improving the product through Analytics
